explains: n. 手把；（美）八字胡（等于 handlebar mustache）

sentences.en: Glimpses of soft feminine features evolve into men with handlebar mustaches and freckle-faced teenagers grinning through braces.
sentences.cn: 温柔的女性的脸孔可能在眨眼间变换成长着胡子的男性和长满雀斑、带着牙套咧嘴微笑的少年。

sentences.en: Electra mount will secure the camera on the handlebar of your bike. [link].
sentences.cn: Electra座架能将相机固定在你的车把上。

sentences.en: Lay your frame in to your case as shown below. note position of handlebar and seatpost.
sentences.cn: 按下面所示的样子把您的车架平放在行李箱内。要注意车把和坐管的位置。
